name: Handless show
description:
You play in new TV-show. Time yourself well, concentrate and perform the round before the guillotine cut off your hand.
You must demonstrate skill as they endure seemingly simple tasks, in the hope of winning a champion cup.

Handless show is vr game with 15 rounds with a gradually increasing degree of complexity. Each round has a mini-game. You need to show your mind, reaction, speed to complete the mini-game

Features

  • 20 fun mini-games
  • Unique vr experience
  • Achievements
